subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ short-handed lineup could not sustain a rally, as the team’s chances of tying a major league record with 14 consecutive victories against one team on the road evaporated.
snippet: The Mets’ short-handed lineup could not sustain a rally, as the team’s chances of tying a major league record with 14 consecutive victories against one team on the road evaporated.
